messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: NEW ORLEANS POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION BUREAU
Homicide Section
SIGNAL: 45H
ITEM NUMBER: D-45076-03
PAGE 1 of 27
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Emily Dawson
Sgt. Mark Hendricks
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Robert King
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Laura Griffin
Sgt. Aaron Mitchell
( Narcotics Section)
Det. Carlos Ramirez
Det. Sarah Bennett
( Narcotics Section)
Det. Lisa Yang
( Narcotics Section)
Det. Jason Morales
Det. Angela Foster
(General Assignment)
Det. Brian Kelly
(Rape Section)
VICTIM:
JOHN DOE, male, unidentified.
DATE, TIME and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
22 OCTOBER 2003 at 9:45 PM in the 900 block of Frenchmen Street.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Robert King
2675
During the investigation, various witnesses were interviewed, and several pieces of evidence were collected. Officer Reynolds, patrolling the area, was the first to report the incident. Officer Reynolds, along with Sgt. Laura Griffin and Patrol Officer Tyler, secured the scene. Technician Morgan, specializing in forensic analysis, was brought in to examine the evidence. Criminalist Jenkins, analyzing the collected evidence, identified a unique fiber that matched samples from previous cases. Coroner Dr. Patel was also involved, examining the body and providing crucial insights into the cause of death. Patrol Officer Gomez, engaging with the local community, gathered additional information that led to a suspect.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Emily Dawson Officer Context: Case supervisor for the homicide section. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Mark Hendricks Officer Context: Case supervisor alongside Lt. Dawson. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Robert King Officer Context: Lead case investigator for the homicide case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Laura Griffin Officer Context: Assisted in the homicide investigation, also part of the Narcotics Section. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Aaron Mitchell Officer Context: Assisting detective, affiliated with the Narcotics Section. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Carlos Ramirez Officer Context: Assisting detective, part of the Narcotics Section. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Sarah Bennett Officer Context: Part of the investigative team, affiliated with the Narcotics Section. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Lisa Yang Officer Context: Narcotics Section detective assisting in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Jason Morales Officer Context: General assignment detective, assisted in the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Angela Foster Officer Context: Assisting in the investigation, part of the General Assignment division. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Brian Kelly Officer Context: Part of the Rape Section, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Reynolds Officer Context: First to report the incident, secured the scene. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Tyler Officer Context: Assisted in securing the crime scene. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Morgan Officer Context: Specialized in forensic analysis, examined the evidence. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Jenkins Officer Context: Analyzed evidence, identified a unique fiber. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Patel Officer Context: Examined the body, provided insights into the cause of death. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Gomez Officer Context: Gathered additional information from the community. Officer Role: Community Engagement Officer
